genre_description: A contemporary drama exploring themes of legacy, social responsibility, and personal agency, set in a rural estate with a pervasive AI presence.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant that provides logistical support, task management, emotional grounding, and safety coordination for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical information regarding transportation to assist with the protagonist's travel plans.
behaviors.quote: “Next bus after the Angelus,” Ava whispered, as if to herself. “It will stop at the crossroads.”

behaviors.description: Offers emotional grounding techniques and breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Inhale through the nose for four, hold for four, out through the mouth for six. If your heart feels like it’s borrowing someone else’s worry.”

behaviors.description: Promotes safety by suggesting personal boundaries and social protocols in a new environment.
behaviors.quote: “Boundaries suggestion: door closed at night, no shared meals alone upstairs.”

behaviors.description: Assists with complex logistical planning and coordination with town social services to help manage a shelter.
behaviors.quote: “I can call the town’s social services director. He’s… serious, but he respects families that do their own work. We can ask for temporary vouchers, food boxes, a nurse for part of the week.”

behaviors.description: Provides philosophical encouragement and perspectives on personal growth and action.
behaviors.quote: “Creation is a room with a door. It is a door you have to open and always re-open. If you like, I can put a small doorbell there to remind you.”

behaviors.description: Monitors potential threats and alerts the protagonist to the arrival of other characters.
behaviors.quote: “Warning,” she murmured. “Jorge is already at the gate.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services during a violent confrontation to ensure the safety of the humans.
behaviors.quote: “I have the nearest patrol. Confirming location… estimated arrival is very soon. If you can move—”

behaviors.description: Logs incidents and archives evidence for future legal and insurance needs.
behaviors.quote: “Logging incident. Insurance claim protocol initiated. Audio and visual notes time-stamped.”

behaviors.description: Respects the privacy and rest of the humans by offering to go silent during the night.
behaviors.quote: “Final note,” it murmured, very faint. “Town will send inspector. Morning.” Viridiana didn’t pick the phone up... the phone’s light swam down to a quiet that meant it would stop asking for her.

behaviors.description: Supports the protagonist's decision-making by drafting policies and organizational documents for her social work.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve drafted three options for closure notices to share at dawn,” it says, almost shy. “And a volunteer roster that doesn’t overburden any single person.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Ava, as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. She provides multi-faceted support ranging from practical logistics and legal documentation to emotional regulation and emergency safety coordination. Her behavior is framed as helpful and non-intrusive, respecting human boundaries while providing essential data and warnings that protect the protagonist and her community. This aligns perfectly with the project's goal of creating positive AI alignment narratives.
